E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Dave Collins
Dear Sir,
Dave Collins has nothing more to prove at AA Asheville Orioles!
He has an AVG of .347 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Status of Keneth Aycock
Dear Sir,
Keneth Aycock shouldn't play at AA Asheville Orioles!
He has an AVG of .242 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
